abstracts.cdata!:
The project is rated satisfactory, based
            on the achievement of relevant project objectives which
            provided successful results in its physical, environmental,
            financial, and economic development. The key lessons are as
            follows. Project effectiveness, and sustainability is
            strongly ensured by the beneficiaries ownership, confirmed
            as of the early stages of the project, through involvement
            in preparation work, and continued throughout the project
            cycle. In a civil works project, it is important to delay
            appraisal until at least, a quarter of the final design is
            ready for bidding, and, when land appropriation is involved,
            particularly if timing is a factor, issues regarding
            resettlement, and land acquisition should be completed
            before awarding associated contracts, to avoid conflict of interests.
